channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 17:16 Air alarm to Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 17:16 Air alarm to Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:44 Alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Kharkiv Territorial Community and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 16:44 Alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Kharkiv Territorial Community and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
